meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Abbott Jon Shoup Margaret Swanson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6407.

td.p: Jim Abbott, a property appraiser from St. Augustine, Florida
Jon Shoup, a graduate student of political science from Charlottesville, Virginia
Margaret Swanson, a graduate student of architecture from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 3-day cash winnings total $48,000)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Margaret: What is K?)

B

MargaretJim
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Broccoli & cauliflower are good sources of folacin, a vitamin of this letter group

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: 1905, the Russo-Japanese War, negotiated--the peace treaty negotiated by President Roosevelt.)
MargaretWhat is Portland?
$5,800
JimWhat is Portsmouth?
$5,801
JonWhat is Burlington?
$1,021
Portsmouth')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'A 1905 treaty named for this U.S. city ended a foreign war 7,000 miles away & was actually signed at Kittery, Maine')

tr.td: A 1905 treaty named for this U.S. city ended a foreign war 7,000 miles away & was actually signed at Kittery, Maine

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
